issue.title: Add .gitignore for *_generated.h files in src/plasma/format
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1146](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1146). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are \*_generated.h from flatbuffer lying around there, which git should ignore.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1146?focusedCommentId=16061500) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
